mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT su.* FROM sys_user su JOIN sys_user_role sur JOIN sys_role sr where su.user_id=sur.user_id and sr.role_id =sur.role_id and sr.role_id='1'
SELECT su.*,s.* FROM sys_user su JOIN sys_user_role sur JOIN sys_role sr join score s where su.user_id=sur.user_id and sr.role_id =sur.role_id and s.userid = su.user_id and sr.role_id='1'

SELECT su.*,dr.zhidaoscore,dr.zhidaoopinion FROM sys_user su JOIN sys_user_role sur JOIN sys_role sr JOIN dadilyreport dr where su.user_id=sur.user_id and sr.role_id =sur.role_id and sr.role_id='1' and su.user_id = #{userId} and dr.`user`=su.user_id
select s.username from sys_user s left join dadilyreport d on s.user_id=d.user where s.user_id=#{userId}
